title: Ten-year trends of antibiotics used for patients with pneumonia at long-term care hospitals in the Republic of Korea: An analysis based on national health insurance claims data
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Jungmi Chae, Dong-Sook Kim, Jihye Shin, Yong Chan Kim, Seung Yeon Ji, Yeseul Kim, Mikyung Ryu
